section.title: VirtuosoError Class
section.para: Collects information relevant to a warning or error returned by Virtuoso server. This class cannot be inherited.

section.title: Thread Safety
section.para: Any public static (Shared in Visual Basic) members of this type are safe for multithreaded operations. Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

section.title: Remarks
section.para: This class is created by the Virtuoso .NET Data Provider when an error occurs. An instance of VirtuosoError is created and managed by the VirtuosoErrorCollection, which in turn is created by the VirtuosoException class.

section.title: Message
section.para: Gets a short description of the error.

section.title: SQLState
section.para: Gets the five-character error code that follows the ANSI SQL standard for the database.

section.title: Property Value
section.para: The five-character error code, which identifies the source of the error.
